title: Meet the Teacher Night
details: Come and meet your new teacher for the year.
volunteersNeeded: Greeter, flyer handout, set up, take down

title: Peter Piper Pizza Fundraiser
details: Show up anytime between 5 and 9. Enjoy pizza and 10 free tokens.

title: PTA Meeting
details: Come and catch up on all things PTA. Pizza and babysitting provided.

title: Trunk or Treat
details: Come dressed up. Make sure to pick treat and not trick. There will be food trucks, mazes, cotton candy, and more. Admission is free.
volunteersNeeded: Donate candy, trunks(decorate and hand out candy), bouncy house supervisor, cotton candy stand, setup, and take down.

title: Fun Run
details: Make sure to pledge. T-shirts will be provided. Expect to be covered in color by the end of the run.
volunteersNeeded: Hand out t-shirts, throw color, laps counter, setup, and take down.

title: Family Movie Night
details: Bring chairs, blankets, and dinner. There will be a concession stand, popcorn, and hot chocolate. Movie will start at sundown.
volunteersNeeded: Concession stand, hand out popcorn/hot chocolate, setup, and take down.

title: HundredX Fundraiser
time: Start at 7:50 on Jan 23, end 11 p.m. on Jan 27
details: Fill out at lease 75 surveys to earn money for your children at school.

title: Winter Carnival
details: Come and enjoy carnival games, food trucks, bouncy houses, and cotton candy. Admission is free.
volunteersNeeded: Greeter, bouncy house supervisor, carnival games supervisors, cotton candy stand, set up, and take down.

title: Art Walk
details: Come and enjoy seeing all the art work done by your child. Admission is free.
volunteersNeeded: Put up art work, run PTA snack booth, greeter, setup, and take down.

title: Peter Piper Pizza Fundraiser
details: Show up anytime between 5 and 9. Enjoy pizza and 10 free tokens.

title: Hello, Good bye, Dance
details: Grade 4 and 5 students come and enjoy some music and fun. There will be a DJ, black lights, games, and snacks.
volunteersNeeded: Hand out snacks, bathrooms supervisor, setup, and take down.
